name: Brothers in Arms Double Time
description:
Brothers in Arms Double Time brings the award-winning Brothers in
Arms franchise to Wii for the first time.

The award-winning WWII franchise comes to Wii with all of the action,
story and authenticity that has critics and fans eager for more. Play as
Sergeant Matt Baker or Joe Hartsock, leading your squad behind enemy
lines through the Normandy invasion in 31 playable levels.
